attributes.action: Complete Disclosure by all Food Agencies, FDA Inclusive of every Ingredient and any Nanotechnology Present
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Stringent Law to Force all companies and food provides to list everything that goes into their food.

From package ready meals with all details, to any fruit or grain that has been harvested as to what has gone into the food. Also where is has been source e.g. Hampshire, UK then Farm Co-ordinates. Full disclosure on any fertilisers or any chemicals used in growing process.

Most Importantly a Full list of any Nanotechnology and it's purpose as well as the companies who use it. And if the Product contains "Prions", it should be removed from the market.
